question.questionA: Leaves glaucous, perfoliate; corolla with six to twelve lobes, yellow.
question.questionB: Leaves light green, not perfoliate; corolla five-lobed, pink, white or yellow.

question.questionA: Stems quadrangular, winged; flowers yellowish pink.
question.questionB: Stems terete, wingless; flowers white or pink.

question.questionA: Basal rosette absent; flowers deep pink or white.
question.questionB: Basal rosette usually present; flowers pink.

question.questionA: Inflorescence a spike (flowers sessile) or raceme with short pedicels.
Basal   rosettes  weak,  often  absent;  leaves  ovate; branches of inflorescence strict.
question.questionB: Basal rosettes persistent; leaves spathulate; branches of inflorescence spreading.
